text:
AliExpress: the most useful finds for women
02 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Lyubov Tankikh
A clothes steamer, a set of ceramic dishes, a robot vacuum cleaner and other cool things from AliExpress that Lifehacker found last week.
More interesting and cheap products can be found on our Telegram channels with the daily updates ‚ÄúFinds‚Äù, ‚ÄúEverything for the peasant‚Äù and in the weekly newsletter with the best finds from AliExpress.
Boots



Winter women's boots with warm faux fur inside and non-slip rubber sole that will not let you fall on the icy sidewalks. Available sizes from 33rd to 42nd.
Price: from 392 rubles.

Buy

Glasses



Slim vintage frames add sophistication to a casual look. A special coating is applied to the lenses, which additionally protects the eyes from harmful blue radiation.
Price: 198 rubles.

Buy

Xiaomi Steamer



A portable garment steamer from a well-known company carefully aligns the fabric and fits even in a small suitcase. Now you can forget about the long-warming iron and the fear of burning a hole in your favorite chiffon blouse.
Price: 1 757 rubles.

Buy

T-shirt



A cotton T-shirt with a print from the popular series Friends. It will come in handy for real fans celebrating the twentieth anniversary of the sitcom.
Price: from 462 rubles.

Buy

Extension



An extension cord with four sockets and five USB ports, made of fire-resistant material. With this device, you can charge several gadgets at the same time.
Price: from 1 915 rubles.

Buy

Folding glass



Foldable silicone cup with lid-valve fits easily in your pocket. With it, you can forget about disposable plastic counterparts and take care of nature once again.
Price: 340 rubles.

Buy

Backpack



This cute backpack is made of thick fabric and is great for everyday wear. In addition to the voluminous main department, there are many pockets for small things.
Price: 1 261 ruble.

Buy

Blender



A powerful portable blender made of durable plastic easily cuts fruits and berries - with it you will have a fresh smoothie every morning. The device is recharged via USB.
Price: 1 311 rubles.

Buy

Odoizer



Steel soap odorizer easily removes unpleasant fish-onion odors from the skin - just wash your hands with it in cool water.
Price: 95 rubles.

Buy

Heater



A small desktop heater will warm you while working in a cool office - a real gift for those who constantly have hands freezing. The radius of the device is 10 m.
Price: 1 769 rubles.

Buy

Xiaomi bedspread



High-quality and very soft, non-electrifying and easy to machine wash. In the reviews, a warm tissue pleasant to the body is noted.
Price: 1 843 rubles.

Buy

Face massager



A massager with silicone bristles will gently cleanse your skin from traces of cosmetics and improve blood circulation.
Price: from 1,032 rubles.

Buy

Ceramic tableware



On a tray with such plates, you can beautifully lay out fruits, berries and light desserts and make beautiful food shots for social networks.
Price: from 1,072 rubles.

Buy

Safety glass for the camera



Glass for iPhone XR does not affect the quality of shooting at all and protects the lenses from scratches and dust. Fastens to an adhesive base and holds firmly to the device.
Price: from 176 rub.

Buy

Scarf



A warm scarf-clamp with a thick lining made of faux fur will protect your neck, face and ears from frosty winds.
Price: 535 rubles.

Buy

Nitratomer



A device that will help determine how many harmful substances contain vegetables and meat that you buy in grocery stores.
Price: 8 313 rubles.

Buy

A bag



A convenient folding bag on wheels is useful both during the trip and for the usual shopping trip.
Price: 527 rubles.

Buy

Mittens



The warmest mittens with fur trim will warm your hands in severe frosts and protect your skin from microdamage. There are other mittens to choose from.
Price: from 282 rubles.

Buy

Stickers



Cheap sticker packs with excellent print quality. There are 12 options to choose from with plants, rabbits, cute whales and other patterns.
Price: 46 rubles.

Buy

Robot Vacuum Cleaner ILIFE V7s



A home helper with whom you can forget about annoying specks on the floor. The device has four operating modes and intelligent motion sensors, thanks to which the vacuum cleaner goes around obstacles and copes with any coating. The robot also automatically returns to the dock for recharging.
Price: 10 791 rubles.

Buy


Note! All prices are valid at the time of publication of the collection. Stores can update the value of goods throughout the day.
